name: Arc Warden
title: Zet
lore: Before the battle of the Primordials, before the light of the world, before the First Day, there was Zet, the Self-Aware Fragment.

flux.name: Flux
flux.description: Engulfs an enemy in a swirling, slowing field that deals damage over time. Effect is stronger when the enemy is alone.

magneticField.name: Magnetic Field
magneticField.description: Creates a circular distortion field that grants evasion and attack speed to allies inside.

sparkWraith.name: Spark Wraith
sparkWraith.description: Summons a ghost-like spark that slowly materializes and seeks out enemies to damage and slow them.

tempestDouble.name: Tempest Double
tempestDouble.description: Creates a perfect duplicate of Arc Warden that can use all of his abilities and items.
